<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>eb473c7f-227d-11d8-8380-000acd021b2b#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A középkor szellemisége</string>
            <string language="en">The inwardness of the Middle Ages</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das inwardness des mittleren Alters</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'inwardness des âges moyens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O inwardness das idades médias</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il inwardness di Medio Evo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εσωτερικότητα των μέσων ηλικιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El inwardness de las edades medias</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A kései középkor szellemisége, a humanizmus és a reneszánsz</string>
            <string language="en">The inwardness of the late Middle Ages, the Humanism and the Renaissance</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">egyetem,  antikvitás,  újjászületés,  </string>
            <string language="en">university, antiquity, rebirth</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das inwardness des späten mittleren Alters, des 
Humanismus und der Renaissance</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'inwardness des défunts âges moyens, de 
l'humanisme et de la Renaissance</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O inwardness das idades médias atrasadas, do 
humanism e do renascimento</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il inwardness Medio Evo ritardati, del humanism e 
della rinascita</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εσωτερικότητα των πρόσφατων μέσων ηλικιών, του 
ανθρωπισμού και της αναγέννησης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El inwardness de las últimas edades medias, del 
humanism y del renacimiento</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Universität, Altertum, Wiedergeburt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">université, antiquité, renaissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">universidade, antiquity, rebirth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">università, antichità, rebirth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πανεπιστήμιο, αρχαιότητα, αναγέννηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">universidad, antigüedad, renacimiento</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>

        <rights>

            <source>costValues</source>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
